# Nurse Buddy - Complete Documentation

> AI-powered nursing school test prep platform. Upload PowerPoint slides from your nursing courses and get 100-question NCLEX-style practice exams with detailed rationales for every answer.

## About Nurse Buddy

Nurse Buddy is an innovative AI-powered study platform designed specifically for nursing students. Unlike traditional question banks that offer generic practice questions, Nurse Buddy generates personalized NCLEX-style exams directly from your own course materials.

### The Problem We Solve

Nursing students often struggle with:
- Generic question banks that don't align with their specific coursework
- Limited practice opportunities for course-specific exams
- Lack of detailed rationales that explain WHY answers are correct
- Difficulty converting lecture slides into study materials

### Our Solution

Simply upload your PowerPoint slides or PDF lecture notes, and our AI generates:
- 100 NCLEX-style practice questions
- Detailed rationales for every answer choice (A, B, C, D)
- Questions organized by NCLEX category distribution
- Content specifically from YOUR course materials

## How It Works

### Step 1: Upload Your Slides
Upload your nursing school PowerPoint presentations or PDF lecture notes. We support PPT, PPTX, and PDF formats up to 50MB.

### Step 2: AI Generates Questions
Our AI analyzes your content and creates 100 NCLEX-style multiple choice questions following the official NCLEX test plan distribution:
- Safe and Effective Care Environment: 25 questions
- Health Promotion and Maintenance: 15 questions
- Psychosocial Integrity: 10 questions
- Physiological Integrity: 50 questions

### Step 3: Study with Rationales
Take your practice test and receive detailed explanations for every answer choice, helping you understand not just what the right answer is, but WHY it's correct and why other options are incorrect.

## Nursing Specialties We Cover

### Medical-Surgical Nursing (Med-Surg)
Practice questions covering adult health conditions, surgical interventions, post-operative care, chronic disease management, and acute care nursing.

### Pharmacology
Drug classifications, mechanisms of action, nursing implications, adverse effects, patient teaching, and medication safety questions.

### Nursing Fundamentals
Basic nursing skills, patient assessment, vital signs, documentation, infection control, safety protocols, and foundational nursing concepts.

### Obstetrics (OB/Maternity)
Antepartum, intrapartum, and postpartum care. Fetal monitoring, labor and delivery, newborn assessment, and maternal complications.

### Pediatrics
Growth and development, pediatric assessment, childhood illnesses, immunizations, family-centered care, and age-appropriate interventions.

### Mental Health / Psychiatric Nursing
Therapeutic communication, psychiatric disorders, medications, crisis intervention, and therapeutic relationships.

### Community Health
Public health nursing, health promotion, disease prevention, epidemiology, and population-based care.

### Leadership & Management
Delegation, prioritization, ethical decision-making, quality improvement, and healthcare team coordination.

## NCLEX Preparation

Nurse Buddy questions follow the NCLEX-RN and NCLEX-PN test plans, preparing you for:
- Next Generation NCLEX (NGN) question styles
- Clinical judgment scenarios
- Priority and delegation questions
- SATA (Select All That Apply) style critical thinking
